column4: Bingo! Congrats. No one here over the past few days realised he was running off the .iso (it took us a day to realize he was running off a usb at all)
thanks, i wish i could get my iso to run that well off of a usb (my iso was about 1 gb containing 3 differen't os installers)
is it always this busy in here?
well, I need my beauty sleep so I don't know about 03:00 (gmt-5) but usually
nice. ok. I work in computer support, so i am good at knowing what people are doing with very little data, and being able to easily explain to them how to go about fixing it.
like I said, congrats.  I was just begining to wonder about the .iso thing, but you caight it right away
now if only i could get my system working.
belive it or not, this all started from a "I can't get Desktop Effects to work" :)
not like i need it though, i usually one have ssh to the box and have 3 other computers.
for you? or the issue from lymek?
ahh ok, and yeah, i am bad with names... i can remember a computer and an issue like it was written down on my hand, but names really don't work for me.
your systems sound like me 15 years ago...now I'm down to one laptop and leave the multiple systems to my daughter
i use it more like a server, then i have two computers, one for my living room (laptop was taken over by my gf) and my desktop in the other room.
if you get a lot of people asking about live cd's it might be work keeping that link i gave kylemm handy.
missed it (and small buffer)...can you resend?
